#
#
#
#
#
#
#When adding a nameand conditions:
#
#select a D up to the closing of the previous dynamic country and change all occurences
#change on that previous dynamic country
#
#
#there's a lone D at the rear end of the file
#Pay attention on whatever happen here because of D00
#
#
#
#
D00 = {

 #Colonial Admin
  #Revolutionary
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Senegal
		adjective = dyn_senegal_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = senegal_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Niger
		adjective = dyn_niger_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = niger_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Congo
		adjective = dyn_congo_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = congo_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Ethiopia
		adjective = dyn_ethiopia_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = ethiopia_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Zanj
		adjective = dyn_zanj_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = zanj_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Southern Africa
		adjective = dyn_southern_africa_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = southern_africa_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

		priority = 101

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_subject_of = c:NET
				has_variable = zanj_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Southern Africa
		name = dyn_c_Dsouthern_africa_subject_NET
		adjective = dyn_subject_southern_africa_ADJ
		
		priority = 101

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_subject_of = c:NET
				has_variable = southern_africa_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Better Politics Mod
	# Proletarian Socialists
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 10
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						leader = { bpm_leader_is_radical_socialist = yes }
						bpm_ig_is_radical_socialist = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# Other Workers' Republics
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_council
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_council_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 6
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
			}
		}
	}
	# Fascists
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 10
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						bpm_ig_is_fascist = yes
						leader = { bpm_leader_is_fascist = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# Liberal Republic
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_radical_republic
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_radical_republic_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 1
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				bpm_country_is_bourgeois_republic = yes
				any_interest_group = {
					bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						bpm_ig_is_left_wing = yes
						bpm_ig_is_urban_institutional = yes
						leader = { bpm_leader_is_left_wing = yes }
					}
					leader = { bpm_leader_is_right_wing = no }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# Liberal Monarchy
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_radical_monarchy
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_radical_monarchy_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 1
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				bpm_country_is_republic = no
				any_interest_group = {
					bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						bpm_ig_is_left_wing = yes
						is_interest_group_type = ig_trade_unions
						leader = { bpm_leader_is_left_wing = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# Early Agrarian Republic
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_early_agrarian_republic
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_early_agrarian_republic_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 5
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				bpm_country_is_republic = yes
				bpm_country_has_modern_agriculture = no
				OR = {
					ig:ig_rural_folk = { bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes }
					ig:ig_agrarian_populists = { bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	# Muslim Left
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_early_muslim_left
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_early_muslim_left_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 6
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				root.religion = { has_discrimination_trait = muslim }
				any_interest_group = {
					bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						bpm_ig_is_lower_institutional = yes
						bpm_ig_is_left_wing = yes
						is_interest_group_type = ig_agrarian_populists
						leader = { bpm_leader_is_left_wing = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				bpm_country_has_modern_agriculture = no
			}
		}
	}
	# Farmer Revolt
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_farmer
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_farmer_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ig:ig_rural_folk = { bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes }
						bpm_country_has_modern_agriculture = yes
					}
					ig:ig_agrarian_populists = { bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# Military Mutiny
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_military
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 5
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# Restorationists
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_reactionary_monarchy
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_reactionary_monarchy_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 1
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						is_interest_group_type = ig_landowners
						is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
						bpm_ig_is_right_wing = yes
						leader = { bpm_leader_is_right_wing = yes }
					}
					bpm_ig_is_liberal = no
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor = {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# Reactionary Republicans
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_reactionary_republic
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_reactionary_republic_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 1
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				bpm_country_is_bourgeois_republic = yes
				any_interest_group = {
					bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						is_interest_group_type = ig_landowners
						is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
						is_interest_group_type = ig_industrialists
						bpm_ig_is_right_wing = yes
						leader = { bpm_leader_is_right_wing = yes }
					}
					# bpm_ig_is_liberal = no
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor = {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# Theocrats
	dynamic_country_name = {
		name = bpm_generic_revolt_reactionary_theocracy
		adjective = bpm_generic_revolt_reactionary_theocracy_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 1
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_theocracy
				any_interest_group = {
					bpm_is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						is_interest_group_type = ig_landowners
						is_interest_group_type = ig_devout
						bpm_ig_is_right_wing = yes
						leader = { bpm_leader_is_traditional_right = yes }
					}
					bpm_ig_is_liberal = no
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

D01 = {

 #Colonial Admin
  #Revolutionary
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Senegal
		adjective = dyn_senegal_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = senegal_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Niger
		adjective = dyn_niger_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = niger_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Congo
		adjective = dyn_congo_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = congo_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Ethiopia
		adjective = dyn_ethiopia_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = ethiopia_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Zanj
		adjective = dyn_zanj_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = zanj_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj

		priority = 2

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor

				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2

		priority = 2

				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

		name = dyn_c_Dsouthern_africa_subject_SPA

			scope:actor = {

			}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no

				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2

			scope:actor ?= {

			}

		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2

			}
		}

		adjective = dyn_subject_senegal_ADJ
		
		priority = 101

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_subject_of = c:ITA
				has_variable = senegal_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

}

D06 = {

 #Colonial Admin
  #Revolutionary
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Senegal
		adjective = dyn_senegal_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = senegal_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Niger
		adjective = dyn_niger_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = niger_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Congo
		adjective = dyn_congo_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = congo_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Ethiopia
		adjective = dyn_ethiopia_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = ethiopia_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Zanj
		adjective = dyn_zanj_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = zanj_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Southern Africa
		adjective = dyn_southern_africa_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = southern_africa_subject_var
			}
		}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj

				}
			}

		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious

		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}

		priority = 2

				}
			}
		}
	}

		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

}

			scope:actor = {

				has_variable = southern_africa_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}
