 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

}

D71 = {

 #Colonial Admin
  #Revolutionary
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Senegal
		adjective = dyn_senegal_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = senegal_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Niger
		adjective = dyn_niger_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = niger_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

		adjective = dyn_congo_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = congo_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

		adjective = dyn_ethiopia_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		}

		name = dyn_c_Dethiopia_subject_FRA
		adjective = dyn_subject_ethiopia_ADJ
		
		priority = 101

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_subject_of = c:FRA
				has_variable = ethiopia_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

		name = dyn_c_Dzanj_subject_FRA
		adjective = dyn_subject_zanj_ADJ

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

}

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_subject_of = c:POR
				has_variable = zanj_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2

			exists = scope:actor

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

				}
			}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie

		priority = 2

			exists = scope:actor

				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {

					}
				}
			}
		}

		priority = 2

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

					is_in_government = yes

				}
			}
		}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious

		priority = 2

		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2

				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2

		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_subject_of = c:ITA
				has_variable = southern_africa_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

}

D76 = {

 #Colonial Admin
  #Revolutionary
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Senegal
		adjective = dyn_senegal_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = senegal_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Niger
		adjective = dyn_niger_ADJ
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = niger_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = congo_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

				is_subject_of = c:FRA
				has_variable = ethiopia_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {

			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3

		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

		adjective = dyn_subject_senegal_ADJ
		
		priority = 101

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_subject_of = c:AUS
				has_variable = senegal_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

}

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_subject_of = c:POR
				has_variable = zanj_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Southern Africa

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor

					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

		is_revolutionary = yes

				}
			}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious

		is_revolutionary = yes

				}
			}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie

		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2

			exists = scope:actor

					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

		adjective = dyn_subject_niger_ADJ
		
		priority = 101

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_subject_of = c:NET
				has_variable = niger_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
		
	dynamic_country_name = { #Congo

 #Revolutions
  # Important ideologies

	dynamic_country_name = { #communist
		name = generic_revolt_communist
		adjective = generic_revolt_communist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_communist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_anarchist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_vanguardist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Fascist
		name = generic_revolt_fascist
		adjective = generic_revolt_fascist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						OR = {
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_integralist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_fascist
							has_ideology = ideology:ideology_ethno_nationalist
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Radical
		name = generic_revolt_radical
		adjective = generic_revolt_radical_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_radical
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #bon appart
		name = generic_revolt_bonapartist
		adjective = generic_revolt_bonapartist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_bonapartist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #legitimist
		name = generic_revolt_legitimist
		adjective = generic_revolt_legitimist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_legitimist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #orleanist
		name = generic_revolt_orleanist
		adjective = generic_revolt_orleanist_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					leader = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_orleanist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Powerful interest groups

	dynamic_country_name = { #Peasant
		name = generic_revolt_peasant
		adjective = generic_revolt_peasant_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_rural_folk = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Landowner
		name = generic_revolt_landowner
		adjective = generic_revolt_landowner_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_landowners = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:CSA
					exists = c:USA
					scope:actor ?= {
						this = c:CSA
					}
					c:USA = {
						has_journal_entry = je_acw_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Intelligentsia
		name = generic_revolt_intelligentsia
		adjective = generic_revolt_intelligentsia_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				any_interest_group = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
					OR = {
						has_ideology = ideology:ideology_liberal
						leader = {
							has_liberal_ideology = yes
							has_progressive_ideology = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Industrialists
		name = generic_revolt_industrialists
		adjective = generic_revolt_industrialists_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_industrialists = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Military
		name = generic_revolt_military
		adjective = generic_revolt_military_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_armed_forces = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Religious
		name = generic_revolt_religious
		adjective = generic_revolt_religious_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_devout = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Bourgeoise
		name = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie
		adjective = generic_revolt_bourgeoisie_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_petty_bourgeoisie = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Unions
		name = generic_revolt_unions
		adjective = generic_revolt_unions_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
				ig:ig_trade_unions = {
					is_in_government = yes
					is_strongest_ig_in_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

  # Generic fallbacks

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 1
		name = generic_revolt_1
		adjective = generic_revolt_1_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #Revolt 2
		name = generic_revolt_2
		adjective = generic_revolt_2_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

	dynamic_country_name = { #revolt 3
		name = generic_revolt_3
		adjective = generic_revolt_3_adj
		
		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 2
		
		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_secessionist = no
			}
		}
	}

		is_revolutionary = yes
		priority = 102

		trigger = {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_secessionist = no
				has_variable = senegal_subject_var
			}
		}
	}

			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = { 
				is_subject_of = c:ITA
				has_variable = southern_africa_subject_var
			}
		}
	}
